fields.name: - Unflipped:
fields.value: A card in your hand that can be **Flip**ped will be. Apply **Plus 1** to that card.

fields.name: - Flipped ( ðŸŒŠ + <:cyan:1106716163184009277> ):
fields.value: Perform a __vanilla__ **Flip**. Draw an **Ethereal** Upgrade?! (1936) and apply **Plus 2** to as many cards in your hand as you want.
